title: The Mooch (Live From Cleveland)
description:
From Slate's Facebook live session on Wednesday afternoon – Jacob Weisberg talks to Anthony "The Mooch" Scaramucci, a Trump fundraiser, about why he thinks everything will be just fine once Trump becomes President.
Trumpcast is brought to you by by Wunder Capital. Invest in large-scale solar projects across the U.S. Create an account for free at Wundercapital.com/TRUMPCAST. Invest in Wunder Capital’s solar funds. Do well and do good.
